name: SimCloud Corporation
overview:
SimCloud Corporation (SimCloud) is a leading provider of emerging technology based business solutions. SimCloud offers a synergistic approach to private and public cloud technology by overlaying core services and experience and combining three main components: SaaS (Software/Applications as a service) PaaS (Platform as a service), and IaaS (Infrastructure as a service). This core platform combined with in-house website development, creative marketing services, and information technology (IT) solutions enables your organization to make data driven decisions and achieve measurable results.

As Google revolutionized the way people use the web, SimCloud defines and revolutionizes the way you do business by increasing efficiency while maintaining the agility needed in today’s market. SimCloud, as a trusted technology advisor, has the resources and reach to help you be successful and achieve your goals.

SimCloud, headquartered in Charlotte, North Carolina, maintains locations in Johnstown, Pennsylvania and Ft. Lauderdale, Florida. The company has established client relations across the country and has forged direct relationships with today’s leading and trusted technology providers such as Google, Dell, and Salesforce.com.
